title: Justin Trudeau, Pimpin’s NFL Picks, How to Start An Argument and more
itunes:title: Justin Trudeau, Pimpin’s NFL Picks, How to Start An Argument and more
description:
Happy Friday and welcome to the ride! Justin Trudeau caught in blackface.  Pimpin stops by to talk NFL picks. J. Anthony Brown teaches us how to start an argument. iHeart Music Festival and Sand and Soul announcements. Trump pulls out wad of cash during an interview. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
